description.value:
Identifier of all Imperial Soldiers, both for when they are alive and dead. Heretics take them as souveniers from those they kill.

Requirements

Part of the Standard Kit of all Guardsmen. Total Weight: ~32kg, Total Cost: 185 Thrones. HB: Get it all at once acquisition at Scarce Availability

Effect: Plentiful

Notes: 1 T
description.summary: Identifier of all Imperial Soldiers, both for when they are alive and dead. Heretics take them as souveniers from those they kill.
